alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Bullock; Pike (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 2:01PM CDT until August 08 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pike County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Bullock County in southeastern Alabama... West central Barbour County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 201 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Banks, or near Troy, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Troy, Brundidge, Louisville, Banks, Pickett, Kent, Antioch, Linwood, Ansley, Troy Municipal Airport, Troy University, Boot Hill, Tanyard, Monticello, Orion, Perote, Josie, Sandfield, Mossy Grove and Mount Andrew. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
